CUDA Emulation
===============

* :google:`CUDA emulation`

* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6595351/compiling-cuda-sdk-examples-in-hardware-emulation-mode
* http://www.eti.pg.gda.pl/katedry/kask/dydaktyka/Przetwarzanie_Rownolegle_CUDA/CELL/06-environment-emulation.pdf


GPU Ocelot
-----------

* http://code.google.com/p/gpuocelot/
* http://isca2012.ittc.ku.edu/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=52&Itemid=58

* http://gpuocelot.gatech.edu/


Portland Group PGI x86 CUDA Compiler
-------------------------------------

Commercial compilers

PGI CUDA-x86 support is included in PGI's GPU-enabled C/C++ compiler products
(the PGI Accelerator products). PGI Accelerator licensees with a current PGI
Subscription get PGI CUDA-x86 at no extra charge. Customers without GPU-enabled
licenses can upgrade by paying just the difference in the license fee for a
GPU-enabled version. Contact PGI sales for more information.


* http://www.drdobbs.com/parallel/running-cuda-code-natively-on-x86-proces/231500166
* http://www.pgroup.com/resources/cuda-x86.htm
* http://www.pgroup.com/products/feature_compare.htm
